outline:
1. flesh
    1. of the body
      1. of humans
      2. of animals
    2. the body itself
    3. male organ of generation (euphemism)
    4. kindred, blood-relations
    5. flesh as frail or erring (man against God)
    6. all living things
    7. animals
    8. mankind
kjv_def: body, (fat, lean) flesh(-ed), kin, (man-) kind, [phrase] nakedness, self, skin.
strongs_def: flesh (from its freshness); by extension, body, person; also (by euphemistically) the pudenda of aman
